spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout roughly matches (open living/dining/kitchen at top, bedrooms bottom-left and bottom-right, bathrooms in left-mid and bottom-center), but there are notable plan-to-render deviations: several hinged doors shown on the 2D plan are represented as open arched openings or are missing entirely (E2/E1), window locations are not consistently replicated for secondary rooms (E2/E1), and some room/hall proportions (hall width and bathroom footprints) appear expanded/relaxed compared to the tight, rectilinear plan geometry (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency is mostly preserved (kitchen adjacent to living/dining; bedrooms off the central hall; bathrooms off the hall). However, wall/door fidelity is weak: multiple door leaves/swing conditions from the plan are not embedded as doors in the 3D (E1/E2), openings are stylized into arches not indicated in plan (E5), and exterior-like recessed areas with plants read as balcony/terrace spaces not shown on the 2D plan (E5). Wall thickness is mostly consistent but some partitions appear simplified/shifted around closets/hall joinery (E2).

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture zones are generally correct (living seating cluster near large window; dining table near kitchen; beds in both bedrooms). Kitchen elements appear rearranged/simplified (island/counters not matching exact plan run geometry) (E2), and some built-in/storage lengths in the hall/bedrooms do not match the plan dimensions (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is coherent and readable; lighting is clean and geometry is mostly crisp. However, the render uses stylized arched openings and simplified detailing that reduces orthographic/plan-faithful accuracy, and some edges/room corners look softened/simplified relative to the plan’s hard rectilinear lines (E6).

detected_errors.description: Several hinged doors shown in the 2D plan (closets/bath/hall/bedroom entries) are missing as actual doors in the 3D and are rendered as open passages.
Door placement/orientation is not faithfully replicated: multiple openings appear widened/shifted and do not reflect the plan’s door swing locations.
Secondary room windowing is incomplete/unclear in the 3D: the plan’s bedroom/bath exterior windows are not consistently present or are not placed to match the plan.
Kitchen counter run geometry does not match the plan layout precisely (counter lengths/turns appear simplified and partially reconfigured).
Hall and bathroom proportions appear relaxed/altered versus the plan (circulation width and some fixture-zone footprints look larger/different).
Hallucinated exterior/balcony-like recesses with plants appear in the 3D where the 2D plan does not indicate terraces/balconies.
Arched/rounded interior openings are introduced in the 3D though the 2D plan indicates standard rectilinear door openings.
Minor rendering/representation artifacts: softened/simplified wall corners and opening edges reduce plan-level geometric fidelity.
